'''''Rise and Shrine''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Shrines of Yashiori Island]]''.

==Trivia==
* The Chinese name {{lang|"The Pilgrim's Guide to the Desert Island"|zh=荒岛朝圣指南}} is likely a reference to the famous science fiction novel {{lang|''{{w|The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy}}''|zh=银河系漫游指南}}.
